page.title: 17 A COACH COMPANY
page.content: Along Downham Road there is a coach company.The coach company is called {Woods Tours.}They provide transport for many people.They organize trips to Dover and then over to France by boat.They also supply transport for school trips.Malcolm Woods and his wife own two companies started in 1967. Before that his grandfather had run buses and coaches. Woods have ten coaches available for use. They operate{fifty}trips a week and on average seven trips a day.The longest trip they do is to{Rimini which is in Italy,a journey of 1400 miles.They have many different types of coaches, from touring coaches to high specifiction coaches. In winter four people work,but in the summer season business picks up, and then they need fifteen people.
